 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרַע‎</span>] **verb** ==extend== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***point directly at***, also ***enter upon*** a path ([[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>213</sup> thinks originally ***divide***, then ***stretch out, make straight***), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***projecting roof***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***long-nosed*** (***torto naso*** [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]]<sup>[[Lev.21.18|Lev 21:18]]</sup>); Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***dispose, arrange***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שרע‎</span> ***arrangement, security*** [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chr 124</sup>; — but Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> explanation as ***mutilated*** [[Lev.21.18|Lev 21:18]]; [[Lev.22.23|Lev 22:23]] [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>2744</sup>, compare [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ὠτότμητος</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרוּעַ‎</span> ***extended***, i.e. too long (in a limb or member), of man [[Lev.21.18|Lev 21:18]], beast [[Lev.22.23|Lev 22:23]] (see  II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חרם‎</span>). **Hithpa\`el** ***stretch oneself: Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׂתָּרֵעַ‎</span> [[Isa.28.20|Isa 28:20]] (see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַצַּע‎</span> p. 427:a). 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂרְעַפִּים‎</span> see below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂעף‎</span>.
